joke:
Sure, here's a chicken joke for you: 

Why don't chickens have Facebook?

Because they already have enough followers pecking them all day!

Sure, here is a joke about ducks for you:

Why don't ducks tell secrets?

Because they're afraid they'll quack up!

Sure, here's a quantum computer joke for you:

Why don't quantum computers ever tell jokes?

Because when they're in a superposition, they can't decide whether the joke is funny or not until someone hears it!

Why don't chickens trust quantum computers?

Because they are always afraid their eggs will be both scrambled and poached at the same time until observed.
